amendment.description: Amendment sought to strike section 453 pertaining to the Limitation on Use of Funds for Designated Representatives as published in the Federal Register on November 2, 2015.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 32 printed in House Report 114-683 to strike section 453.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Grijalva amendment (A029) Failed by recorded vote: 177 - 249 (Roll no. 433).

action.text: Amendment failed in Committee of the Whole
Roll call votes on amendments in House
House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the Grijalva amendment (A029) Failed by recorded vote: 177 - 249 (Roll no. 433).
House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A029) offered by Mr. Grijalva.
